Shijingshan inner district of west Beijing

sentences.english: Yang Shulin is a gourd pyrography artist in Shijingshan District.
sentences.chinese: 楊淑林，現居石景山區，葫蘆烙畫藝人。

sentences.english: The Shijingshan Iron Smeltery, founded in 1919, predecessor of the Shoudu Iron and Steel Co.
sentences.chinese: 首鋼的前身是石景山鍊鋼廠，創立於1919年。

sentences.english: Taijing School is located in the Nhorth-west Back Street of Yamenkou Village , Shijingshan District.
sentences.chinese: 臺京學校位於石景山區衙門口村西南后街。

sentences.english: At Shijingshan we passed the huge steel mill and the power plant.
sentences.chinese: 我們經過石景山這座大鋼鐵廠和發電廠。
